verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> our brother <S%G80><s%>,

To the saints <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> that are at <S%G1722><s%> Colossae <S%G2857><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>.

We give thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God2316, 2532 the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, praying <S%G4336><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>,

having heard <S%G191><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the love <S%G26><s%> which ye have toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%>,

because <S%G1223><s%> of the hope <S%G1680><s%> which is laid up <S%G606><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>, whereof <S%G3739><s%> ye heard before <S%G4257><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>,

which is come <S%G3918><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>; even as <S%G2531><s%> it is also in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> bearing fruit <S%G2592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> increasing <S%G2531><s%>, as it doth in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, since <S%G575><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> ye heard <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1921><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>;

even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> ye <S%G3129><s%> learned <S%G3129><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Epaphras <S%G1889><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> fellow-servant <S%G4889><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> on our <S%G5216><s%> behalf <S%G5228><s%>,
who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> declared <S%G1213><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> love <S%G26><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, since <S%G575><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> we heard <S%G191><s%> it <S%G3973><s%>, do not <S%G3756><s%> cease <S%G3973><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make request <S%G154><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may be filled with <S%G4137><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> understanding <S%G4907><s%>,

4043, Romans9 to walk <S%G4043><s%> worthily <S%G516><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> pleasing <S%G699><s%>, bearing fruit <S%G2592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> increasing <S%G837><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>;

strengthened <S%G1412><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> power <S%G2904><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the might <S%G1411><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%>;

giving thanks <S%G2168><s%> unto the Father <S%G3962><s%>, who made <S%G2427><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> meet <S%G2427><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be partakers <S%G3310><s%> of the inheritance <S%G2819><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the power <S%G1849><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> translated <S%G3179><s%> us into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> love <S%G26><s%>;
in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> our redemption <S%G629><s%>, the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of our sins <S%G266><s%>:
who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the image <S%G1504><s%> of the invisible <S%G517><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> creation <S%G2937><s%>;

for <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> were <S%G2936><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> created <S%G2936><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon the earth <S%G1093><s%>, things visible <S%G3707><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> things invisible <S%G517><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> dominions <S%G2963><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> principalities <S%G746><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> powers <S%G1849><s%>; all things <S%G3956><s%> have been created <S%G2936><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> consist <S%G4921><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%>, the church <S%G1577><s%>: who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%>, the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things he <S%G846><s%> might <S%G1096><s%> have the preeminence <S%G4409><s%>.
For <S%G3754><s%> it was the good pleasure <S%G2106><s%> of the Father that in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> should <S%G2730><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the fulness <S%G4138><s%> dwell <S%G2730><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him to reconcile <S%G604><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> himself <S%G846><s%>, having made peace <S%G1517><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> cross <S%G4716><s%>; through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, I say <S%G1535><s%>, whether things <S%G3588><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, being in <S%G1271><s%> time past <S%G4218><s%> alienated <S%G526><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> in <S%G1271><s%> your mind <S%G1271><s%> in your evil <S%G4190><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>,

yet now <S%G3570><s%> hath he reconciled <S%G604><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, to present <S%G3936><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without blemish <S%G299><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unreproveable <S%G410><s%> before <S%G2714><s%> him <S%G846><s%>:

if <S%G1489><s%> so be that ye continue in <S%G1961><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>, grounded <S%G2311><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stedfast <S%G1476><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> moved away <S%G3334><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye heard <S%G191><s%>, which was preached <S%G2784><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> creation <S%G2937><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; whereof <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%>.

Now <S%G3568><s%> I <S%G3739><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> sake <S%G2532><s%>, and fill up <S%G466><s%> on my part that which is lacking <S%G5303><s%> of the afflictions <S%G2347><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> body <S%G4983><s%>'s sake <S%G5228><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>;

whereof <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which was given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you-ward <S%G5209><s%>, to fulfil <S%G4137><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>,

even the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which hath been hid <S%G613><s%> for <S%G575><s%> ages <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> hath it been manifested <S%G5319><s%> to <S%G40><s%> his <S%G846><s%> saints <S%G40><s%>,

to whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was pleased <S%G2309><s%> to make known <S%G1107><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the riches <S%G4149><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, the hope <S%G1680><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%>:

whom <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> proclaim <S%G2605><s%>, admonishing <S%G3560><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we may present <S%G3936><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

whereunto <S%G1519><s%> I <S%G2872><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, striving <S%G75><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> working <S%G1753><s%>, which worketh <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> mightily <S%G1411><s%>.
